name: misskey
description: Misskey is a modern, decentralized social media platform built with ActivityPub. It supports real-time interactions, reactions, custom emoji, themes, and federation across servers.

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Live timeline updates, instant notifications, and real-time chat functionality

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Share images, videos, audio files, and documents with built-in media viewer and gallery

features.title: Theme Customization
features.description: Extensive theming system with custom CSS support and community-created themes

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Rich text editing with Markdown support, mentions, hashtags, and content warnings

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Granular privacy settings for posts including follower-only, unlisted, and direct messages
